resources.string:
Hi, this is a really long bio. I don't know why I'm writing all of this, It's really late and don't know why I'm working on this right now. I've been binge learning android so that I can develop the app that I want to make. It's a really good idea but I'm not sure if it will go as planned... This text needs to be long.



 so here's a few spaces

 I guess it's worth a shot. Now let me finish with this really, really, reallllllllllly long line.
